citations.narrative:
The animals have been moved from the approved site. Some have been donated or sold, and some currently live at a
location in Florida. Licensee did not notify Animal Care of the change in address for the location of the regulated
animals. APHIS officials must know the location of the animals to ensure optimal animal welfare and well-being. A
licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name,
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or
type of animals.
Correct by: January 5, 2020
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the President.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The animals have been moved from the approved  site.  Some have been donated or sold, and some currently live at a 
location in Florida.  Licensee did not notify Animal Care  of the change in address for the location of the regulated 
animals.  APHIS officials must know the location of the animals to ensure optimal animal welfare and well-being.  A 
licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before  any change in the name, 
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or 
type of animals. 
 
Correct by:  January 5, 2020 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the President. 
 
End Section
